= Redis Documentation =

[http://pyha.ru/wiki/index.php?title=Redis:index Russian Translation]

Hello! The followings are pointers to different parts of the Redis Documentation.

 * New! You can now [http://try.redis-db.com Try Redis directly in your browser!].
 * [README The README] is the best starting point to know more about the project.
 * [QuickStart This short Quick Start] provides a five minutes step-by-step istructions on how to download, compile, run and test the basic workings of a Redis server.
 * [CommandReference The command reference] is a description of all the Redis commands with links to command specific pages.
 * [TwitterAlikeExample This is a tuturial about creating a Twitter clone using *only* Redis as database, no relational DB at all is used], it is a good start to understand the key-value database paradigm.
 * [IntroductionToRedisDataTypes A Fifteen Minutes Introduction to the Redis Data Types] explains how Redis data types work and the basic patterns of working with Redis.
 * [Features The features page] (currently in draft) is a good start to understand the strength and limitations of Redis.
 * [Benchmarks The benchmark page] is about the speed performances of Redis.
 * [FAQ Our FAQ] contains of course some answers to common questions about Redis.
 * *[SponsorshipHowto How to donate]* to the project sponsoring features.

= HOWTOs about selected features =

 * [ReplicationHowto The Redis Replication HOWTO] is what you need to read in order to understand how Redis master `<->` slave replication works.
 * [AppendOnlyFileHowto The Append Only File HOWTO] explains how the alternative Redis durability mode works. AOF is an alternative to snapshotting on disk from time to time (the default).

= Hacking =
 * [ProtocolSpecification The Protocol Specification] is all you need in order to implement a Redis client library for a missing language. PHP, Python, Ruby and Erlang are already supported.

 * Look at [RedisInternals Redis Internals] if you are interested in the implementation details of the Redis server.

= Videos =

 * [http://mwrc2009.confreaks.com/13-mar-2009-19-24-redis-key-value-nirvana-ezra-zygmuntowicz.html watch the Ezra Zygmuntowicz talk about Redis] to know the most important Redis ideas in few minutes.
